Example Reusable Key.name: Example Reusable Key
Example Reusable Key.description: An example of an item used as a requirement. Not consumed on use.

Example Expendable Key.name: Example Expendable Key
Example Expendable Key.description: An example of an item used as a requirement. Consumed on use.

Example Reward.name: Example Reward
Example Reward.description: An example of an item gained as a battle reward

Example Reward 2.name: Example Reward 2
Example Reward 2.description: An example of an item gained as a battle reward

Wacky Thing.name: Wacky Thing
Wacky Thing.description: How did you get this? You would have had to fight off a very powerful foe to get this...

Astrostew.name: Astrostew
Astrostew.description: You're not sure what is in this, but it must be safe, right? Doesn't expire 'till Lumora 23rd, 4008!

Bandages.name: Bandages
Bandages.description: Stuck on them, 'cuz they're stuck on you!

Blight Fruit.name: Blight Fruit
Blight Fruit.description: A citrus-smelling fruit with enough acid in its juices to corrode metal.

Corebits.name: Corebits
Corebits.description: A small, glowing pebble of energy. They're most commonly used as currency among scavengers and mechanics alike.

Rusty Pipe.name: Rusty Pipe
Rusty Pipe.description: A rusty pipe. It looks like it could be used as a weapon, but it's not very effective.

Scrappy Armor.name: Scrappy Armor
Scrappy Armor.description: A piece of heavy armor made from scrap metal. It offers some protection, but it's not very reliable.

Super Serum.name: Super Serum
Super Serum.description: A supernatural concoction of untold power. [[c:red]DEV ITEM[c:]]].

Super Health Maximiser.name: Super Health Maximiser
Super Health Maximiser.description: Infuses your constitution with divine power. [[c:red]DEV ITEM[c:]].

Super Strength Maximiser.name: Super Strength Maximiser
Super Strength Maximiser.description: Infuses your muscles with divine power. [[c:red]DEV ITEM[c:]].

Super Agility Maximiser.name: Super Agility Maximiser
Super Agility Maximiser.description: Infuses your nervous system with divine power. [[c:red]DEV ITEM[c:]].
